summary: "Collateral" is a 2004 American action thriller film directed by Michael Mann. It stars Tom Cruise as a hitman and Jamie Foxx as a cab driver who gets caught up in his spree. The story begins when Foxx's character agrees to drive Cruise's character for a high fare, only to be taken hostage. The film was well-received, making over $220 million worldwide and earning an Academy Award nomination for Foxx's performance. It was shot mainly in Los Angeles and was the first film to use a high-definition camera.
title: Collateral (film)
